scripts.dev: concurrently -n worker,web "pnpm run dev:worker" "pnpm run dev:web"
scripts.dev:web: concurrently -n wasm,web "node scripts/watch-wasm.mjs" "cd apps/web && pnpm dev"
scripts.deploy:web: pnpm run build:game && cd apps/web && NEXT_PUBLIC_API_BASE=https://api.worms.bne.sh NEXT_PUBLIC_WS_BASE=wss://api.worms.bne.sh pnpm run build && cd ../.. && pnpm --filter worms-worker exec wrangler pages deploy ../web/out --project-name=worms-web
scripts.build:game: cd packages/game-core && cargo build --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && mkdir -p ../../apps/web/public/wasm && cp target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/game-core.wasm ../../apps/web/public/wasm/game_core.wasm
